service_def.name: DigitalAudioSensor
service_def.description: The Digital Audio Sensor Service provides a means of configuring a digital audio stream, often from a microphone or other source. Note that the transport of the digitized audio stream itself is not covered by this service, and may use existing audio networking standards such as RTSP.
service_def.assumptions: Messages may be delayed, lost or reordered.

message_def.name: SetDigitalAudioSensorConfiguration
message_def.description: This message is used to set the current configuration for one or more audio sensors. Each Set message contains a local request ID; this ID is returned by the corresponding SetDigitalAudioSensorConfigurationResponse message and may be used by the client to coordinate requests and responses.

fixed_field.name: MessageID
fixed_field.interpretation: A two byte field to hold the message ID of a message

fixed_field.name: SensorID
fixed_field.interpretation: ID of the sensor. Zero (0) is not a valid ID in this message.

fixed_field.name: Sensitivity
fixed_field.interpretation: The gain or volume applied to the input as a percent. A value of 0% indicates that no output signal is generated, while a value of 100% indicates that maximum amplification is applied to the input.

fixed_field.name: MinimumBitRate
fixed_field.interpretation: kilobits per second. Different min and max bitrates may result in a Variable Bit Rate (VBR) stream, if supported.

fixed_field.name: MaximumBitRate
fixed_field.interpretation: kilobits per second. Different min and max bitrates may result in a Variable Bit Rate (VBR) stream, if supported.

fixed_field.name: SampleRate
fixed_field.interpretation: Samples per second

message_def.name: QueryDigitalAudioSensorCapabilities
message_def.description: This message is used to query the full set of capabilities (supported performance levels) for one or more sensors. A SensorID of zero (0) may be used to query all sensors supported by the service in a single message.

fixed_field.name: MessageID
fixed_field.interpretation: A two byte field to hold the message ID of a message

fixed_field.name: SensorID
fixed_field.interpretation: ID of the sensor being queried. Zero (0) is used to query all sensors associated with this service.

message_def.name: QueryDigitalAudioSensorConfiguration
message_def.description: This message is used to query the current configuration (active performance level) for one or more sensors. A SensorID of zero (0) may be used to query all sensors supported by the service in a single message.

fixed_field.name: MessageID
fixed_field.interpretation: A two byte field to hold the message ID of a message

fixed_field.name: SensorID
fixed_field.interpretation: ID of the sensor being queried. Zero (0) is used to query all sensors associated with this service.

message_def.name: ConfirmSensorConfiguration
message_def.description: This message is used to notify a client component that the configuration has been received with the values specified in the corresponding set message with Request ID matching the value of field 1 of this message. If the specified configuration request is deemed valid, the SensorIdRec is returned with the matching SensorID (or illuminatorID) of the sensor (or illuminator) for which the configuration was successfully set. If the requested configuration is invalid, one of the ErrorRec types shall be returned (depending on the source message) with an error code and description of the configuration setting which was deemed invalid.

fixed_field.name: MessageID
fixed_field.interpretation: A two byte field to hold the message ID of a message

fixed_field.name: SensorID
fixed_field.interpretation: ID of the sensor. Zero (0) is not a valid ID in this message.

fixed_field.name: SensorID
fixed_field.interpretation: ID of the sensor. Zero (0) is not a valid ID in this message.

fixed_field.name: SensorID
fixed_field.interpretation: ID of the sensor. Zero (0) is not a valid ID in this message.

fixed_field.name: SensorID
fixed_field.interpretation: ID of the sensor. Zero (0) is not a valid ID in this message.

fixed_field.name: SensorID
fixed_field.interpretation: ID of the sensor. Zero (0) is not a valid ID in this message.

fixed_field.name: SensorID
fixed_field.interpretation: ID of the sensor. Zero (0) is not a valid ID in this message.

fixed_field.name: SensorID
fixed_field.interpretation: ID of the sensor. Zero (0) is not a valid ID in this message.

fixed_field.name: SensorID
fixed_field.interpretation: ID of the sensor. Zero (0) is not a valid ID in this message.

fixed_field.name: SensorID
fixed_field.interpretation: ID of the sensor. Zero (0) is not a valid ID in this message.

message_def.name: ReportDigitalAudioSensorCapabilities
message_def.description: This message is used to report full set of capabilities (supported performance levels) for one or more sensors.

fixed_field.name: MessageID
fixed_field.interpretation: A two byte field to hold the message ID of a message

fixed_field.name: SensorID
fixed_field.interpretation: ID of the sensor. Zero (0) is not a valid ID in this message.

fixed_field.name: MinimumAllowedBitRate
fixed_field.interpretation: kilobits per second

fixed_field.name: MaximumAllowedBitRate
fixed_field.interpretation: kilobits per second

fixed_field.name: MinSampleRate
fixed_field.interpretation: Samples per second

fixed_field.name: MaxSampleRate
fixed_field.interpretation: Samples per second

message_def.name: ReportDigitalAudioSensorConfiguration
message_def.description: This message is used to report the current configuration for one or more audio sensors.

fixed_field.name: MessageID
fixed_field.interpretation: A two byte field to hold the message ID of a message

fixed_field.name: SensorID
fixed_field.interpretation: ID of the sensor. Zero (0) is not a valid ID in this message.

fixed_field.name: Sensitivity
fixed_field.interpretation: The gain or volume applied to the input as a percent. A value of 0% indicates that no output signal is generated, while a value of 100% indicates that maximum amplification is applied to the input.

fixed_field.name: MinimumBitRate
fixed_field.interpretation: kilobits per second. Different min and max bitrates may result in a Variable Bit Rate (VBR) stream, if supported.

fixed_field.name: MaximumBitRate
fixed_field.interpretation: kilobits per second. Different min and max bitrates may result in a Variable Bit Rate (VBR) stream, if supported.

fixed_field.name: SampleRate
fixed_field.interpretation: Samples per second

parameter.interpretation: enveloped Query Digital Audio Sensor Capbilities message

action.name: sendReportDigitalAudioSensorCapabilities
action.interpretation: Send a ReportDigitalAudioSensorCapabilities message to querying client

parameter.interpretation: enveloped Query Digital Audio Sensor Configuration message

action.name: sendReportDigitalAudioSensorConfiguration
action.interpretation: Send a ReportDigitalAudioSensorConfiguration message to querying client

parameter.interpretation: enveloped Query Digital Audio Sensor Capbilities message

action.name: sendReportDigitalAudioSensorCapabilities
action.interpretation: Send a ReportDigitalAudioSensorCapabilities message to querying client

parameter.interpretation: enveloped Query Digital Audio Sensor Configuration message

action.name: sendReportDigitalAudioSensorConfiguration
action.interpretation: Send a ReportDigitalAudioSensorConfiguration message to querying client

parameter.interpretation: enveloped Set Digital Audio Sensor Configuration message

guard.interpretation: True if the command message was received from the client currently controlling this component.

action.name: setConfiguration
action.interpretation: Update the settings for any sensor IDs with valid and supported configurations specified in the message

action.name: sendConfirmSensorConfiguration
action.interpretation: Send sendConfirmSensorConfiguration message with confirmation or error code for each specified sensor ID
